description:
Hawkins Bingham & Miller, located in Kingsport, Tennessee, is a law firm that focuses exclusively on personal injury claims. Our firm was founded in 1957 by William W. Hawkins, and for sixty years we have been following his vision of providing quality legal services to clients with personal injury claims. 

Hawkins, Bingham & Miller is recognized as a preeminent law firm in East Tennessee and has maintained the highest rating from Martindale Hubbell for many years.  Our attorneys, John Bingham and David Miller, are Board Certified Civil Trial Specialists by the National Board of Trial Advocacy and have more than seven decades of combined legal experience helping people just like you who have been negligently injured due to the actions or carelessness of others.

At Hawkins, Bingham & Miller we know that when you or a loved one have been injured in an accident you will have questions about your case.  When you come to our office you will meet directly with one of our attorneys who will talk to you about your case and answer your questions.  When you hire Hawkins, Bingham & Miller to represent you an important attorney-client relationship is created.  Throughout your case you will be able to talk to your attorney about the status of your claim.

We offer free consultations to all of our clients, and there is no obligation to you if you come in to discuss your case with us. We have obtained positive results for many clients throughout the region, and we are confident that we can develop an approach that allows us to pursue maximum compensation on your behalf for your personal injury claim.
